com.jbirdvegas.mgerrit.activities

Class PatchSetViewerActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • FragmentActivity
      • com.jbirdvegas.mgerrit.activities.PatchSetViewerActivity

  • public class PatchSetViewerActivity
extends FragmentActivity
    An activity representing a single Change detail screen. This activity is only used on handset devices. On tablet-size devices, change details are presented side-by-side with a list of changes

    This activity is mostly just a 'shell' activity containing nothing more than a PatchSetViewerFragment.

      • setSelectedStatus

        public void setSelectedStatus(String status)
        Sets the details for the selected change and re-creates the options menu. By using the status, we can query the database and get both the change id and the change number.
        Parameters:
        status - The status of the selected change
